duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead a team of trust and safety agents to review and enforce content policies in line with TikTok's Community Guidelines.
Manage daily team activities, work distribution, and handling of escalations to ensure smooth operations.
Review graphic, controversial, and offensive video content to ensure adherence to community guidelines.
Conduct weekly reviews for management on key deliverables.
Audit the work of trust and safety agents for accuracy and compliance.
Respond to and manage trust and safety inquiries from internal and external stakeholders.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma required; BA/BS Preferred
